MAIN.SYNOPSIS: This application is a simple example of some of the features that Angular provides for developing, in this case, single page applications
MAIN.TITLE_CASE: A short explanation about the case
MAIN.FEATURES: The main feature of the application revolves around a heroes list, similar to the Angular introductory tutorial used for introduce itself. This app includes a really simple REST backend with some mocked data and some interaction with that information. It implements the following concepts

HERO_LIST.FILTER_AS_DESIRED: Filter the heroes as you wish
HERO_LIST.FILTER_ONE_OR_MORE: Use a single filter or either combine some of them to make a more restrictive filtering
HERO_LIST.ACTIONS_TIP: Shown data in the table can be edited with the corresponding controls
HERO_LIST.ACTIONS_EDIT_TIP: For editing or deleting a hero, please use the embedded buttons availables for each one.

LOADER.WAIT: Please, wait while we talk with the backend
LOADER.NO_RESPONSE: There wasn't any response from the backend

DIALOG.CONFIRM_DELETE: Are you sure you want to delete the specified hero?
DIALOG.TIP_VALIDATIONS: Please have in count that the information must be compliant with the validations
